title: Net area of URC shall be calculated after deducting the area under CRZ and Forest, if any
clause_text: Net area of URC shall be calculated after deducting the area under CRZ and Forest, if any. Out of total net area of the URC, maximum of 50% area in terms of one or more plots, to be called Free Sale Plots, shall be carved out for raising resources to cover the cost of construction of rehabilitation component and development of all the reservations and
section: Planning for Rehabilitation and Free Sale Plots in URS â€“
